nodes.text: Haden Vazzar was a male Human, who served the Galactic Republic during the time of the Jedi Civil War.

Vazzar served the Republic as a scout and attained the rank of lieutenant. In 3957 BBY, Vazzar was among a team of Republic agents who went on a mission to the planet Sernpidal, where they recovered a code cylinder that held the command codes for the sensor systems on Darth Revan's flagship. Afterwards, they traveled to the Republic ship Viscount and assisted the Jedi Bastila Shan in a mission to capture the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Revan. During the mission, Vazzar and the other agents encountered the Sith apprentice Darth Voren.
